explore module

explore.class_frequency(data, column='Politikbereich')

Plots the occurence frequency of each value in a dataframe column.

Parameters

  • data (DataFrame,) – DataFrame with column where unique values are counted.

  • column (str (default: 'Politikbereich'),) – column name where unique values are counted.

Returns

frequency_plot – Plot of unique value frequencies.

Return type

AxesSubplot,

explore.word_frequency(tokenized_data, category)

Plots the occurence frequency of tokenized words in ‘Zweck’ for a given ‘Politikbereich’ value.

Parameters

  • tokenized_data (DataFrame,) – DataFrame where ‘Zweck’ column has been tokenized.

  • category (str,) – ‘Politikbereich’ value for which word frequency is counted.

Returns

frequency_plot – Plot of unique word frequencies.

Return type

AxesSubplot,
